definitions.title: n.pr. mens.
definitions.body: Shₑbāṭ, 11th month (post-ex:) = Feb. – March; loan-word from Bab. Šabâṭu (COT:Ne 1:1 Dl:WB), Zec 1:7 (der. fr. šabâṭu, strike, kill destroy (Dl:Prol 38; WB), Lyon:Bib Sacr Apr. (1884), 384 Jen:ZA iv (1889), 273 Muss-Arn:JBL xi (1892) 171 f. al., as month of destroying rain; another conjecture in Zim:KAT 3. 594 n; this month called [[שבט]] also in Nab Palm, v. Lzb SAC:111)
